mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NO, DEPT_NO AS BATIS_DEPT_NO, POS_NO AS BATIS_POS_NO, EMP_NAME, EMP_GENDER, EMP_PHONE, EMP_SAL, EMP_EMAIL, EMP_HIREDATE, EMP_RETDATE, EMP_SSC, EMP_DEGREE, EMP_CAREER, EMP_PWD, EMP_PHOTO, EMP_MIL FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NO = #{value}
SELECT * FROM EMP_WORKINGHOUR ew, EMPLOYEE e WHERE ew.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO AND ew.EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND ew.WORK_START BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startdate}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(#{enddate}, 'YYYYMMDD')
